dark.desc: Notify the component that the background is a dark color

spaced.desc: If set to true, the corresponding direction margins will be set to 8px; It can also be set to a size in CSS units, including unit name, or one of the xs|sm|md|lg|xl predefined sizes
spaced.desc_cn: 如果设置为真，则相应的方向边距将设置为8px；它还可以设置为CSS单位的大小，包括单位名称，或xs | sm | md | lg | xl预定义大小之一

inset.desc: If set to Boolean true, the left and right margins will be set to 16px. If set to 'item' then it will match a QItem's design. If set to 'item-thumbnail' then it will match the design of a QItem with a thumbnail on the left side

vertical.desc: If set to true, the separator will be vertical.
vertical.desc_cn: 如果设置为true，分隔符将是垂直的。

size.desc: Size in CSS units, including unit name
size.desc_cn: 以CSS单位表示的大小，包括单位名称

color.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.desc_cn: 组件的来自Quasar调色板的颜色名称
